name: chalkopyriteprocess
title: Chalkopyrite Processing
author: CurryKing
description: Converts Stone (Chalcopyrite) with the help of water to 17,3% Copper Ore, 15,25% Iron Ore, 17,45% Sulfur and 50% Stone. Keep in mind, that you have to deal with the sulfuric waste water. This mod is very helpfull in Bob's and Angel's mod, where you have many stones when mining ores. Thanks to DellAquila for delivering most of the code with his mods.
